channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Kaye Adams, Alex Brooker, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Isy Suttie take on a series of quizzes selected by Richard. A daily winner is declared at the end of each show, and the scores are tallied across the week to find an overall House of Champions winner.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes
channel.desc: Robson is reunited with acting pal Angela Lonsdale in the Northumberland countryside. Angela lets Robson introduce her to wild swimming at Sweethope Lough under the watchful eye of Team GB cold-water swimmer Fenwick Ridley.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Villages by the Sea
channel.desc: Ben Robinson finds evidence of early pilgrimage at a remarkable Norman priory. In a 500-year-old house in the village, the archaeologist examines a wall mural that proves it was the birthplace of an important Elizabethan archbishop.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Nigella: Cook, Eat, Repeat
channel.desc: Nigella debates whether one should meddle with classics. She thinks that in the case of her crab mac`n'cheese, it's a must. If the sight of glorious melted cheese isn't enough, fear not, as she follows it with her `mine all mine chocolate cookies'.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
channel.desc: Richard McCourt and Dominic Wood are in a vintage Land Rover Series 2 as they scour every nook, cranny and dusty shelf in Hampshire for treasures to sell at auction. They're joined on their journey by Irita Marriott and David Harper.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Murder 24/7
channel.desc: Following teams of detectives and specialists involved in murder investigations.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: QI
channel.desc: More of the best moments from the U series, hosted by Sandi Toksvig with Alan and their guests.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Small Town, Big Riot
channel.desc: Mobeen Azhar investigates how a protest outside an asylum seeker hotel turned into a riot, uncovering a blueprint for a national wave of violence that eight months later would affect us all.
